title: Community Culture-Based Numeracy Education for Adult Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Most learners are job seekers aiming to strengthen workplace competencies by improving mathematical literacy. Focuses on real-life problem-solving scenarios incorporating local cultural elements.

learning_goals: Students can apply mathematical reasoning by analyzing real statistical data from the local community.
Students can comprehensively interpret verbal and non-verbal information in mathematical problem situations linked to everyday life.
Through team-based projects, students can logically explain the process of solving mathematical problems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
